BasicInfo.short: Eonite Perception is a 3D mapping and tracking company on a mission to enable machines to understand the real world.

Products.name: EONITE REALITY INSIGHT™ SDK
Products.description: home scale, real time, 3D scanning and reconstruction SDK and Unity plugin, supporting persistent virtual content, occlusions, and shadows.

Products.name: Eonite Vantage Head Tracker™
Products.description: positional tracking for AR & VR headsets, Inside-out, 6DoF, jitter free, and runs at very low latency on a mobile class CPU
